onyomiExamples.meaning: (sense of) taste, counter for food, drink, medicine, etc.
seasoning, flavoring, flavouring, addition, inclusion, taking into account

kunyomiExamples.meaning: flavor, flavour, taste, charm, appeal, uniqueness, attractiveness, experience, taste (e.g. of victory), smart, clever, witty, strange
sharpness, cutting ability, quickness (of wit), incisiveness, technical proficiency, skill, peppiness (of a ball)
to taste, to savor, to savour, to relish, to appreciate, to enjoy, to relish, to digest, to experience, to go through, to taste (e.g. victory), to know (e.g. pain)
